content.detailedDescription: So at about 7:14 i was getting the paper i looked up at texas hill. then i sudenly saw three round discs. at first i thought it was a hawlk. but then it went in a round motion and then dissapeared. nothing after that.
content.summary: 3 seperate discs

content.detailedDescription:
My sister and i were playing in the yard at our grandparents farm when we noticed these objects in the sky to the nnw on a bright sunny day with absolutely no clouds. they would have been well above the horizon, but not more than about 15���  from horizontal. these 5 or 6 pure white geometric shapes (circle, square, triangle) were in a straight line horizontally with space between them and with no visible connection. they appeared to be cut out pieces of white paper. it is difficult, with no other reference  objects, to estimate how distant they were. i had the impression that they were perhaps 1 mile away or more and if i would have held up my hand vertically at arm's length it would probably have hidden them. i can still visualize them as clear as ever.   

these objects were not moving and as it was something we had not seen before, we watched for only 5-10 seconds and decided to go in and tell our grandmother to come and look. she came out immediately and we discovered that the objects had disappeared. they would have had to move very quickly to be out of sight in such a short time. we were certainly familiar with aircraft, but this sighting was so unique we were very perplexed. this is a prairie location with very little physical relief, so there was not much to obscure one's view unless an object descends close to the ground and goes behind the occasional poplar bluff.

this is something that is still very clear in my mind even though it occurred 56 years ago and i was only 4 years old. i can still identify the exact spot where we stood when this sighting took place. my sister was one year older. i'm sure that if i visit the location again i could take a digital photo and superimpose the objects as i recall them. in all the material i've read or tv shows that have been presented over the years, i have never heard of anyone witnessing anything like this. if mufon has had any similar report, i would like to hear of it.

sincerely, rick
content.summary: These were a series of 5 or 6 geometric shapes in a row, bright white with no visible features.

content.detailedDescription: It was the night of september,13,2006 when i looked out the window to admire a days work of gardening when i noticed that there was an odd shaped airplane in the sky,when i looked closer,i was shocked! it had an amazingly bright head and was moving remarkably fast.It could have been discribed as a hummingbird because it could hoover in one spot or move in any direction,then i soon realized a plane could never do that. i quickly took out my cellphone and took a picture before it hovered over my house and disappeared. i was not the only witness to this event,my parents were witnesses as well,but after a while they became so scared they regarded it as a figment of their imagination. but i still belive that picture tells a thousand words, and the fright we all expirenced that night. i truly am not a skeptic anymore!
content.shape: Boomerang,  Bullet,  Missile,  Disc,  Fireball,  Flash,  Saturn-like,  Sphere,  Star-like,  Triangle
content.summary: It turned into various shapes, at first i thought it was an airplane but it started hoovering and it moved in various directions the best way to describe it was "it moved like a hummingbird".This is because it hoovered then moved back rapidly and so on.

content.summary: Roswell

content.detailedDescription: I was at my home in la plata county colorado last night, (june 1, 2007) when i woke up and went to get a glass of water at approximately 11:30 pm.  i glanced out the kitchen window and noticed a very large, bright white light to the west. at first i thought maybe it was a hot air balloon.... but why would it be so lit up and out flying at 11:30 at night.  i stepped out on porch and the object appeared to be standing still in the sky and about the size of my thumbnail at arms length. quite large.  at times it apeared spherical and at other times eliptical or oval in shape.  i was able to go grab the binoculars and when i observed the object through the binoculars, i then could see that it was covered with many bright white lights.  there were spaces between the lights.  the lights were steady. it now appeared that the object was moving slowly away from me.  i observed it for approximately 30 minutes.  my wife saw it also.  then suddenly it just dissapeared.
content.summary: Sherical or eliptical object covered with lights moving slowly wnw direction

content.detailedDescription:
I just saw a ufo today, 5/31/07 at 12:45pm.  i was at fountain creek nature center near my home in fountain, colorado doing yoga on a platform out in the wetlands...When i noticed swirling energy (not clouds) above me.  i was relaxing, doing meditation, while lying flat on my back looking up into the sky.  i usually meditate with my eyes closed...But for some reason i'd opened them and was observing the interesting energy swirls.  they are difficult to describe.  i'd never seen anything like it before...But there was an obvious energy disturbance taking place directly above me in the sky.  then a small white cloud appeared out of nowhere (now here).  it was just suddenly there.  it didn't form...One second it wasn't there and the next second there was this peculiar little white cloud that showed up and looked about the size of a softball.  an even smaller piece of this small white cloud separated from the main cloud.  the main cloud quickly disappeared...Evaporated or something...Leaving this peculiar little white triangular cloud in the middle of the blue sky.  the swirling energy was no longer noticeable by the time the main little cloud disappeared.  then this little bitty (gee, it's hard to gage size in a huge blue sky with only one little bitty cloud...But i'd say it looked about the size of a big marble...A shooter i think they call them.  then that little white cloud started spreading out...And behind it i saw, clear as day, a cylindrical shaped matte metal object.  it looked about the size of half a ball point pen...And was rounded on both ends.  it's cloud cover totally disappeared leaving a non-shiny silver grey object...It was only visible for approximately 15 seconds or so...But i saw it clearly.  i'd like to state that i was not under the influence of any mood or mind altering substances...Unless fresh air and exercise are considered to be mood or mind altering.  i admit i have been sleep deprived...But that hasn't affected my mental functioning to my knowledge.  i believe i'm operating on all cylinders.  i know what i saw and i give my word as a woman of honor that i
saw what i saw.  i am of extremely sound mind and body, have never
hallucinated that i remember, and know what i saw was not made by human
intelligence.  then it just disappeared.  it did not move or accelerate in
any way.  it made no noise.  it must have shifted into another dimension or whatever they do...I don't know how they operate but would love to learn.  hopefully more solid metal objects will be appearing for others everywhere soon...Not just in my area.  one thing i'd like to add, is that i consciously had asked to see one yesterday.  i was playing the game
"wouldn't it be nice if...." and i decided it would be nice if i finally had a really-oh truly-oh sighting...Not just lights flying around or orbs
like i've seen before...I wanted to see something solid with no mistaking it for anything else.  damned if whoever (or whatever) was tuning into the
vibration of my thoughts didn't deliver.  i encourage those of you reading
this...If you would like to see something...Put that intention out to the
universe...Play "wouldn't it be nice if..." and be specific.  keep looking
up.  keep your eyes peeled.  be aware.  they are here...Now!!  the universe delivers!
respectfully submitted,
elise eagle
content.summary: Ufo at fountain creek nature center, fountain, colorado, usa 5/31/07 12:45 pm

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking during my lunch break on may 29, 2007 directly east of the afa stadium about 3 miles.  during my walk, i noticed what appeared to be a white point of light, below the foothill ridge line, about a mile or two to my northwest.  the sky was dark behind the foothills, as a storm was probably a 10 miles away.

i noticed a small, round, light object that traveled in circle pattern of less than a 1/4 mile.  soon, another light followed.  i thought it might have been a ballon caught in an up draft; however, then an other light followed.  these appeared to travel from the north, in a circle pattern down, then back up.  their velocity was not constant (slow, then fast).  i followed one as it circled up, then moved south at a constant rate before it became too difficult to see above the ridge line.  

there were aircraft traffic in the area (not exactly at this time); however, there was no noise and i know the types of aircraft allowed in this restricted airspace. it was not an aircraft of any sort.  i know that it could not have been an aircraft, because the object was within 3 miles of my position (below the ridgeline) and it would have been easy to id. could it have been weather ballons/devices for observations? 

i first took notice because of 'some white thing caught in an updraft'.  however, when i continued to look over a period of 5 minutes, it appeared to be white a point light with.  then another appeared.  after years of observing aircraft in this area, these did not fit anything i've ever noticed before.  it left me feeling like i saw something that didn't fit any norms.
content.summary: White lights traveling in circular patterns, near foothills of colorado

content.detailedDescription:
june 1, 2007


dear mr. bowden

 i hope you received my ex wife's side of the encounter, now i want to tell you mine, in case i forget and leave something out when i speak to you in person. i called the clinic today that did my steroid injections, main desk couldn't find the year, so i am expecting a call back from scheduling, to see if they have the year, but i can tell you if my wife says 97 or 99 its one of those, i also called my regular doctor to see if they might have the date, the nurse told me she looked pretty far back and couldn't find it, i'm thinking the date was removed because the specialist that did my spine injections made a mistake, here's my story. got up early still dark out went in for my spine injections, i will speed this up, was in getting the injections, when doctor missed the pocket the steroid was to go into, i yelled out in much pain, ex wife took me home, i was on strong pain meds, it didn't help, my ex wife wanted to go do some shopping, i told her i didn't want her to go as i was in more pain then i had ever had, even worse than the spine infusion years ago, i knew i shouldn't be left alone, she said she would hurry back, i fell asleep on the sofa, when i woke i got up very slowly to go to the rest room, i lost all, and i mean all hearing both ears, i thought for sure i was going to die, as a christian i prayed for gods help, i walked over and grabbed the phone, i laid back down and called 911, i told them that every time i got up i lost all hearing, and to please send rescue, when rescue got there they noticed my strong pain meds, and said i probably just took to many pain meds, i told them i hadn't, i said the doctor made a mistake with the steroid shot, and i was sure it went to my brain, they almost laughed at me, they just told me to call my doctor, and they left, soon my ex wife came back, i told her i need to go back to doctor, as my pain is very bad and when i stand up, all hearing goes, then it happened everything went silent, i pointed to my ears to let her know, i couldn't hear, i could see her worried look, she called the doctor, and then took me back in, i told the doctor at home i was loosing my hearing, he didn't believe me and told me, in a stern voice, this has never happened before with any patients i have had, in fact he said he had never heard of it before, i didn't believe him. my ex wife took me back home, i went into the bed room to lay down by now it was getting dark outside, i looked up and saw what was kind of shaped like a xmas tree with lights under it (triangle), point facing me, it didn't move, it made no sound, ex wife was gone again, i went into bathroom, as i stood over the toilet, all hearing left me again, but i didn't feel like i was passing out. i went back to bed, i looked up and i noticed this small craft was now slowly moving forward, i looked close and i noticed a alien looking back at me from a small opening underneath the craft (big head, big eyes, no nose, small lips) i got the feeling he was telling me to not be afraid he seemed nice, but as a christian i was a little pissed, as i had heard bad things about what they do to people, i don't trust aliens, as i don't feel they are from god, and i thought with all the pain and hell i'm in why are they enjoying watching me, leave me the hell alone, i prayed all night for god to help my pain, my wife and i fell asleep, then i was awake i noticed what looked like humans sitting on the floor in a circle, but there skin was very white and pail, the one that looked female spoke she said we are hear to help you, i noticed what looked like steam coming up from the floor, they asked me to come and sit down in the circle where the steam was coming from, i was now standing on the floor with them around me, i started jumping around mocking them, putting my hands to my lips acting like, oh i'm so scared, i thought i'm not falling for your evil tricks, i serve the lord you cant touch me and i'm not afraid of you, next thing i knew the people, steam and craft were all gone, and i was praying lord please take me home, i cant stand this pain anymore, to this day i do regret not sitting down in what ever that was coming from the floor, i knew what had happened was real when my wife said she also saw them, and that i was jumping around acting like a fag ( her very words), i told her it was because i was pissed at them, and i figured they would of taken or done something bad to me, like i had read about with other people. about a week latter, my ex wife went into the living room looked outside and saw little aliens, she said they were kind of walking in a jerky robotic way there were three of them, the leader looking one pointed up to the night sky, as the other two also looked up, she came back into the room to tell me i could see she was terrified, i said cool lol, don't worry there probably just coming back to check on me. one day after that i was in my back yard and was buzzed by a black helicopter, i was just sitting in a chair and i was being watched so close i went in and told my ex wife to come see this, she goes wow mark omg the black copter was close just a few feet above the tree line and it was side ways, just watching me, i'm ex military (6 years national guard) i thought this is strange a black out of place military copter watching me and no marking on it, must be the police looking for someone, for over a week this same black copter buzzed my house, sometimes i would play with them to see what they would do, so i would try to hide behind a bush etc. one time i jumped in my car and headed to the store up the street to see if they would follow me, i was freaked out to find not only did they follow me to the store, but they were waiting for me when i came out. i want to add that ever since my ufo encounter, i started having sleep problems, kicking and screaming in my sleep, it got so bad my ex wife and i could no longer sleep in the same bed, part of what destroyed our 20 year relationship, i was sent to the sleep lab, and was told i scream and act like i'm fighting something off , a nurse video tapped me in my sleep she said it was very dramatic to see, and that at one point my foot came up and i even kicked myself in the rear end. to this day, i'm told i have nightmares all the time but i never remember them. 




sincerely,  mark akers
content.summary: Healers or  evil deception, you decide?

content.detailedDescription: It was early afternoon in about the middle of may in kansas city, ks.  a partly cloudy day with plenty of sunshine.  i was practicing a technique called cloudbusting when i noticed a high-flying dark object float into view.  if not for me looking directly at the cloud i wouldn't have noticed this object and several times i lost sight of it momentarily as it dipped and flew backwards down and then stopped.  it looked like a bird without flapping it's wings.  it stood motionless for a few minutes as the clouds behind it continued drifting, and then it would turn on it's side slightly and shoot backwards rather quickly and then just as soon as it began it stopped again and drifted virtually motionless.  at first my wife and daughter and myself thought it could be a very large high flying bird that was caught in a jet-stream and instead of traveling south in the direction it was pointing it just stayed stationary for a few minutes before dipping down and backwards as if the wind was too strong for it to make any progress.  soon we began to doubt whether or not it was a bird because of the height and size.  i know some birds have been known to fly several miles up but none of the north american species looked like this object.  the way it moved made me think i was possibly seeing some type of unmanned drone aircraft that wasn't powered by conventional engine, maybe it was designed to float high above a specific point.  from where i was standing the object looked to be approximately 7500-15000 feet or more in alttitude and about as big as a leerjet in size.  all black in color shaped like a bird crossed with a boomerang and a b-2 stealth bomber.  as time passed on the object continued drifting backwards towards the north as it was a southerly wind that day, until i lost track of it.  ps: i have read a few accounts from witnesses in the states around me who have reported similar sightings maybe they are the same thing. also of note i don't know if it was because the sky was so bright and the object so far away and small but when i looked at it there appeared to be a fuzzy dark moving aura surrounding it.  like i said it may have just been because the sky was so bright with the white illuminated clouds around it and because it was so dark maybe it was an optical illusion gving it the aura.
content.summary: Looked like a large mechanical triangular black bird without flapping wings

content.detailedDescription: I was playing ball with my dogs on the evening of tuesday, may 29th at around 8-8:30pm.  i was in my yard admiring the almost full moon that was in the south east area of the sky.  i noticed, what seemed to be a star (as bright as sirius or vega would be, but in the night sky) floating still,  relitivly close to the moon...This did not make since, being that the sun was still up.  i continued to examine the "star" for the next 1-2 minutes. i was looking around for any neighbors who could confirm the that there was an object up there, because i could not believe what i was seeing myself, but no one was outside, and i did not want to distract myslef away from the situation any more than i already had. i stared at this "star" intensivly, trying to make since of it. "could i actually be seeing a ufo?" i asked my self a few times...I tried to rule out a plane (i live next to an airport) or even military aircraft, but there was no movement...It was just hanging there still, high in our atmosphere.  i had taken my eye off of the object, to briefly check on my dogs, and looked back up at the sky to find the object was gone. i was very stunned, and a little bit angry that i looked away from the object,because i knew better.  but it appeared again!!! in the exact same spot...I was determined to not look away again. about 15-20 seconds after i relocated the object, it faded from its diamond color into a light brownish/red color (like mars appears in the night sky), faded in and out 2 times, then was gone. if i was questioning what the object was before...Seeing it fade in and out and completly dissapear was making me question it more. i could not justify the object being a plane or any other earthly aircraft at this point. i tried desperatly to snap pictures with my cell phone camera, but with no luck.  my experience lasted about 2 minutes total.
content.summary: Looked like sirius or vega in broad daylight hanging still high in the atmosphere

content.detailedDescription: Above the orange co. fire authority a thin "ballon like" snaked shape figure.  it remained still even when the wind was blowing.  if moved into the question mark figure before rising into the clouds/fog. we were looking north from out home bordered by portolla parkway, jamboree and the 261 toll road.
content.summary: Balloon like, at first like a snake, then a question mark

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking around the block looking for my dog and i stopped, turned around to look up at the stars, and that is when i saw it. moving from south to north was object that looked like a flatish, diamond shaped craft with irregular little lights, all the same size but not defined and "fuzzy".  the lights did not sparkle, all the same color, white, real bight and very small-but not like a pin prick. but very small.  about 10 lights and not in any regular pattern.  it moved at a  very consistant moderately slow speed. no sound what-so-ever.  it bore no realtionship to gravity and floated through space. it was nothing like an airplane.  the sky was black, the air very still and no clouds.  it was like a structure moving and floating through space. it flew or floated off and out of sight into the west. i know it was a ufo.

this report was placed on-line by chuck reever mufon director of investigations as mrs. xxxxxx does not have a computer.

estimate of the object diameter is 179.00 feet based on interview information.
content.summary: Flatish, diamond shapecraft with tiny lights floating through space.  no sound.

content.detailedDescription: Call me ill send pics via e-mail dont know how pics got in my phone. u have to see these.
content.summary: I saw 2 bars of light with a dark area between them close mvng sthw  to ne

content.detailedDescription:
I've decided to do this because of shag harbour and its relative time approximation to my sighting a month or more earlier. i was in a rock 'n roll band at the time which was based in edmonton. we had finished playing a job in a very rural town about 250 miles, roughly north of edmonton. let me state at the outset that we were neither drinkers nor in to drugs at that point in any of our histories as young men. we finished at 1 a.M. and packed up immediately (about a half hour to 45 mins., stopped for a burger at a truck stop (probably 30-45 mins.), and left to return to edmonton. the night was very starlit and beautiful. i was in the front seat on the passenger side with the band's keyboardist and lead singer driving, and our second vehicle, a 3/4 ton truck driven by our 'roadie' with our lead guitarist with him, perhaps 500 yards behind. we had radio between the two vehicles. laying in the back of our vehicle was the drummer and bassist, brothers, in our band. apparently the drummer had fallen asleep, but our bassist was still somewhat awake.

since very young, i've always had a thing for gazing into starry skies and was doing that as willie drove, about 3:30 or so in the a.M., driving on a well-paved 2-lane highway far away from towns, etc. i noticed a "light" down the highway. i didn't think anything of it as from afar, it could have been a typical single light illuminating a country intersection. then i noticed something about the light which caught my attention. it appeared to be moving. 

now, you have to try to understand that what took place was very, very fast and the whole thing, from the time i noticed the light was moving until i clearly saw an underbody passing over our car, that it would have been about 5 seconds, perhaps 7 seconds. as i noticed the light was "moving" at great speed toward us, i asked our driver "what the heck is that?" by that point it was nearly on us and my head was at the dash, looking out and up. what i clearly saw was an underbody of a circular craft, unlit yet seemed lit because i saw a bluish green colour to it. i was immediately yelling and my heart was leaping. the driver never saw anything unusual and immediately accused me of making something up, but called back to the truck and we all got out of the vehicles and talked. i was beside myself, but the only other person who noticed anything was the bassist who claimed that upon my yelling, he looked out of the tail end of the station wagon and noticed a light shooting away from our location. the next day our band played in calgary, and i read the calgary herald, which contained a tiny "filler" article well-back in the paper dated from maclennan, alberta, close to where we were that night, which claimed farmers were saying they had seen strange lights or something of that ilk. i'll never forget the look of that flying over our car. for many reasons, i've kept this mostly to myself, and as sightings go, it wasn't much, but it was very unmistakable and had to have been exactly what i saw...Of course, because our car was, i believe, heading west at that point and the craft going the other way, after it passed over our car i saw nothing else. the bassist, as i said, claimed he saw a light shooting away from us...This is really all i can say about it as i was immediately discredited by our lead singer/keyboardist, well-known for his need for absolute control, so besides the bassist, there was no other corroboration, and they scarcely reacted to the small article i gleaned from the newspaper next day from the farmer-sightings near maclennan, alberta...That's it!
content.summary: Saw a light over a very rural highway; noticed it was moving toward our car; then saw unmistable sight of object flying over our car.

content.detailedDescription: It was a sunday night and i was getting ready for bed, my mum who had opened the window had seen the ufo like shaped and started calling me to her "aisha, aisha quickly look at this", as i looked i was shocked to see how big it was it was too big to be a star and was very bright so i got out the digital camera and took lots of pictures then as soon as i loaded them onto my laptop i was stunned to see how ufo like it was and of course now i am a beleiver.
content.summary: The ufo was bright and bigger than usual and is there every night

content.detailedDescription: Dont remember to much details just space out but the witnesses saw the event after i woke up...........I
content.summary: 2am in the morning saw something, have headaches, missing time 50 min i am not the same have nightmares of future............Its crazy dont understand............

content.detailedDescription:
I was skywatching and saw this object coming towards me. moving southeast to north. i noticed right away there were no faa lights on it. it made no noise. a light appears in the upper left of it for a second or two. then it goes out. then a different light appears in the front of it. it doesnt just appear, it starts out dim then gets brighter. i lost the object when it passed over my house and into the treeline.

http://www.Livevideo.Com/video/11581a6403d5427da17f748e00ea19fb/ufo-over-boardman-may-29-2007.Aspx
content.summary: Object moved southeast to north. either a boomerange or triangle

content.detailedDescription:
Our family was walking the dog in the middle of washington park on saturday evening, may 26, 2007 around 9:30. our eleven year old son pointed and asked "what's that?"  there were event search lights flashing on the clouds at the time. at first we thought he was asking about the lights. however, all four family members quickly spotted a dark triangular or boomerang shape moving slowly across the background of light, broken cloud cover.  the clouds were part of a storm front moving out toward the southeast.  the sky to the northwest was clear.  there was a half moon due south and occasionally visible through breaks in the receding clouds. the dark shape was clearly moving independently of the cloud movement.  the shape was never illuminated by the search lights and had no lights of its own. it also did not appear to reflect light. it was evident primarily due to the absence of light, like a shadow. it was distinct when the cloud backdrop was solid and very hard to see when it crossed a darker or broken patch in the clouds.  we first spotted the shape maybe 50 degress above the southeast horizon, in the direction of south high school from our vantage point. the shape moved slowly to the southeast, maybe 10 degrees and then reversed direction back toward the northwest without turning. it became faint and then disappeared in a larger area of dark sky. we watched it for a total of 3 to 4 minutes. it was very hard to tell its size or how far away it might be, other than it was below the clouds. 
at first we speculated that it might be a kite or a bird.  there was no discernable breeze to keep a kite aloft and it did not move like either a kite or bird. we kept our eyes on that area of sky for the rest of our walk to the south end of the park and back and did not see anything further. 
so, we are just curious if anyone else saw this or has an explanation.
content.summary: Dark, unlighted triangle silhoutted against lighter clouds.  moved first southeast, then reversed.  lost sight of object when it moved beyond clouds into dark sky.

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were driving back from santa fe, nm to wichita, ks, when i noticed a bright star in the sky. what was odd was that the clouds didn't obstruct the view of this object. it didn't appear to move, but it didn't look like a star.
content.summary: Looked like a star in the early morning sky, but the clouds appeared to be behind the object.

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were driving back from santa fe, nm to wichita, ks, when i noticed a bright star in the sky. what was odd was that the clouds didn't obstruct the view of this object. it didn't appear to move, but it didn't look like a star.
content.summary: Looked like a star in the early morning sky, but the clouds appeared to be behind the object.

content.detailedDescription:
This is completely uncharacteristic of me - but i have no explanation for the following. my wife and i had been home approx. 20 min after being away for four days. we heard a very loud noise approaching outside. instantly thinking 'car' or 'train' and quickly discounting those thoughts, i jumped and ran outside. the aircraft-like noise boomed through the air like extremely fast, low flying aircraft. what i saw next made me drop my iced tea. two sets of lights - red, horizontally set - spinning around each other in perfect cylindrical form... then the heart-stopping separation; one set sharply northwest, the other slightly northeast. the nw set continued directly away in sight for some time. the sound passed quickly. the ne set seemed to stop altogether and dim. if one were to walk up and see at that moment, the ne set would have appeared no more than a faint star.
 as i continued to watch the same area, the most brilliant shooting star tore from the upper right to the lower left quadrant of the sky.
 at this point i should add - it is not characteristic of that portion of the sky to be home to massive air traffic. but as i continued to look in that one direction, my peripheral vision picked up 10-15 aircraft - high, low, fast, stationary - all in the same quadrant. my wife can verify this.
 i don't know what to think - i'm an intelligent logical thinking person. i could find nothing regarding this phenomenon on any satellite news or otherwise channel. i can find no mention or astronomical explanation on the internet (meteor shower, homeland security, i've tried many things). if anyone saw this in the same time period and area - or if anyone reads something that could be offered as an explanation to this, i am completely open for suggestion.
content.summary: Unexplainable blatant ufo sighting in northern arizona.

content.detailedDescription: We were headed west on us highway 60 between aurora, mo nad monett on december 28, 2000 around 9pm cst. it was a cloudy foggy night with poor visability, (no normal aircraft were flying). cloud ceiling was less than a 1/4 of a mile.  my husband and i observed a bright strobing light comming through the clouds passing slowly from the south to north north east. it crossed in front of us making no audiable noises.  there was aprox. 20 to 25 cars on that portion of the road. by the descriptions i have heard and read about, i think this was the same ufo that appeared so many other places around the same time.  the object itself was not visable just the lights. we would have been southeast of the salina ks sighting and northeast of the oklahoma sightings and about the right time. i wish we could have seen the object but cloud cover prevented it. we checked when we got home and there was no aircraft aloft except for comercial jets that could get above the cloud cover.  if you have any questions please give me a call anytime. thanks
content.summary: Saw bright lights comming over highway 60 between aurora, mo and monett mo

content.detailedDescription: We were hiking by a lake and came over a crest and in the valley was a bright light and horrific noise. we saw the light begin to lift and we turnned to run and heard the roar of the ufo. we turnned to see that it was gone. we contacted local police but told us there was nothing they could do. we were scared and it took our breath away.
content.summary: Hard to see shape over whelming lights.. loud roar of sound.

content.detailedDescription: I went out on our patio with mty coffe and looked towards the northwest to see if the cloud cover/marine layer looked like it would blow away and i saw the objet, i watched it as long as i could. i was closely wathing to see if it elevated, as the onlt explanation i could come up with is that it was possible somekind of balloon that got away from the fair grounds. it's path seemed unhindered in any way by the mild breeze. when the object was almost out of sight i thought i saw another smaller black objet connect with the sphere.
content.summary: Black sphere aprx 300 ft constant speed & altitude northeast direction

content.detailedDescription:
I went outside my back porch to gather some herbs for a late dinner. when i was heading back into the house, i noticed a rather large reddish-orange/yellow round object near the moon. it looked really unusual so i stopped to watch it. it appeared to move slowly westward in the sky. i got excited so i yelled for my husband to come here quickly!
he also thought it was very peculiar so he went in to grab the camera, while i did not want to take my eyes off it. it looked like a fireball to me, but it moved so slowly and in a controlled fashion from east to west.  i suspect it was not a meteor. it definitely was not an airplane or helicopter. it was completely silent. i stayed to watch it as it faded from sight, still hight in the air several minutes later. i wonder if anyone else saw this thing? i saw it from the tacoma area, on the south end of tacoma. it appeared brighter with the naked eye than the picture i have included. by the time he got the camera, it was further away than when i first saw it.
content.summary: Slow moving "fireball"

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting outside on a pattio. looking north i noticed a small white object floating and moving very slowly away apparently near but under the rain clouds in the area. object appeared the size of a printed period held at arms length, quite small. distance might have been a few miles and altitude a few thousand feet above the ground.

i was watching the rain clouds and happened to see the object.

object could have been a balloon blowing horozantally instead of ascending.

feelings were curiosity. object seened completely non threatening.

object moved slowly away and i lost sight due to trees low on the horizion.
content.summary: White apparently spherical object moving slowly under rain clouds

content.detailedDescription:
I think my case is a special one because i see the ufos regularly.I'm from tehran but have been a university student for four years in babolsar, a small, coastal town in the extreme north of iran. i have been interested in the ufo subject from high school. for the first time, two years ago, at around 5 am in december, i noticed a very bright fast moving light in the sky moving from north to south. from that moment i became very curious about the existence of ufos in north of iran also before that i also heard about a lot of ufo sightings in iran especially the northern cities. so, i used to watch the sky a lot. when one day i saw a ufo at 6:30 p.M. i watched at the same moment the next day and to my suprise i could see again and again. i couldn't see them everyday because the sky was cloudy most of the times. during the last year i just could see the starlike ufos which moved usually from south to north ( toward the caspian sea) mostly at 6:30 to 7:00 p.M..But by the start of the previous semester at november, again i used to watch the sky at 6:30 p.M.. now to my suprise i saw new kinds of ufos. these ufos were flying very low at an altitude of about 200-300 meters and were very small nearly at the size of a football. these unmanned ufos are covered with a halo of yellow-white and very dim light that they are unnoticeable and when i saw one of them for the first time i mistook it with a bird on which the light from ground was reflected, but when i saw the object several times i got it. these drones sometimes move singly or in pairs or in a triangular formation and i once saw 16 of them ( i counted) in an arrowhead formation at 6:35 p.M. and once i saw nearly 50 of them moving slowly at 1:40 a.M. towards the caspian sea. the late 2 months i feel more activity as i see lots of starlike and drone ufos at 8:30 to 9 p.M..I have bought a 5mw green laser. this device helped me a lot. when i shoot the low altitude small ufos the light reflects perfectly which shows the smoothness of the surface, and the ufo tries to dodge my shot and sometimes increases its speed. when i shoot the starlikes they immediately make their light very dim or invisible. only one of the ufos which i think is the same responds to the laser beam by glowing very sharply for 2 -3 seconds and later goes off.
i have also seen other things for example once i saw a glowing stork which i'm sure was made of light ( like laser projection ) and surprisingly was flying like a bird ! there have been reports of some strange creatures in the caspian sea which you can find on the net.
i believe the investigation of ussr which concluded that there are some ufo bases under the waters of caspian sea. i wish you could come to investigate in iran because ufo sighting is a very common and handy phenomenon in babolsar. you should just know the time of their flight then you will see them trafficking for about 30 minutes every night.
content.summary: Ufo bases in caspian sea and regular ufo sightings in babolsar, iran.

content.detailedDescription: While out with a couple of friends having diner on 5/24/07 i saw something very strange in the sky over johnson city, tennessee.  we were sitting on the patio of the restaurant and i happened to look up at the sky and see what initially looked like a commercial jet's landing lights turn out.  as it got closer it all of the sudden got very bright and increase in size dramatically.  i would guess that the object was about 15,000 feet in altitude when i first saw it, but it's hard to tell when you don't know the size of the object.  anyway, after about 5 seconds at it's brightest and biggest point, it immediately shot straight into the sky at an incredible rate of speed until it was merely a pinpoint of light about the size of a very distant star.  it continued to move slowly at that point until it was out of view completely.  i barely had time to mention it to my friends before it was too small to see, so as far as i know there were no other witnesses near me.  i did not notice any other lights on the object and am quite certain that it was not a airplane, and it certainly moved faster and in a way that i've never seen a traditional aircraft move.  all i had available to me was a camera phone and knew that it would not capture anything useful.  i have no doubt that i saw something amazing and beyond the norm.  truely remarkable.
content.summary: Strange moving light in sky above johnson city, tn

content.detailedDescription: What ever it was blew up.Would like to talk to someone.Was hauling mail.I was in my truck.
content.summary: Round and yellow  like the moon and it blew up
